actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend section 601(a) (2) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to provide that the salaries of Senators and Representatives may not be subject to any cost-of-living adjustment under such section before October 1, 1978.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to prohibit cost-of-living salary adjustments for Members of Congress based on any adjustment of the General Schedule which takes effect before October 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 601(a) (2) of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to provide that the salaries of Senators and Representatives may not be subject to any cost-of-living adjustment under such section before October 1, 1978.
